Posts.EditableText:
I have recently created a new game called the title of this topic, however it is privates right now as I need people to beta test the game....it is currently very short, and the only reason I am releasing it this early on is so people can tell me any typos, bugs or just general feedback....this game is in no way meant to be finished or even close and probably won't be out of beta for very, very long time...this is a very early build I can't stress that enough, I just find it hard to scan my own work for typos and buds and need people's help doing it.

Also one thing you need to know about the game, it is an 18+ adult section game, as it has strong erotic themes with detailed sex scene's if you don't like that then this isn't the game for you. 
If you want the link PM and I will send it through PMs.
